section_title: ANNUAL COMPILATION AND ACCOUNTING REPORT BY PROTOCOL ANNEX B PARTIES:
sentences: The SBI did not reach conclusions on this issue and the consideration of the issue will continue at SBI 33. BOLIVIA expressed disappointment at the lack of conclusion, highlighting the abuse of mechanisms by developed countries, saying they are transferring emission reduction responsibilities to developing countries and using the flexibility mechanisms to generate profits in their own territories.
Also expressing disappointment, VENEZUELA noted the lack of a clear signal from developed countries to respect the principles of the Kyoto Protocol.
